attributes.action: Insist China/Korea adopt laws to end suffering/ pain to dogs in their country
attributes.background: Korean/China believed to inflict maximum pain/panic/suffering/terror on dogs during capture/farming/holding and death causes adrenilin that improves meat qualility, the dogs live a hell on earth and face a slow death of being blowtorched/skinned and boiled ALIVE, the innocent have no rights or hope

rejection.details:
The UK Government can't insist that the governments of other countries change their laws. You could start a new petition calling on the UK government to urge the governments of North/South Korea and China to change their laws.

We already have some similar petitions open:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/120702

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121974
